text: Sonic Unleashed is a 2008 adventure video game, which was released for Wii, PlayStation 3 (PS3), PlayStation 2 (PS2) and Xbox 360. In the game, Sonic can turn into a giant werehog with amazing power at nightfall. But in the day, he returns to normal and races though many levels to fight Eggman and his robots, like in other Sonic the Hedgehog video games. ==Plot== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2008 video games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog games Category:Gameloft games Category:Sega video games Category:3D platformers Category:Mobile games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Sega beat 'em ups Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Werewolf video games Category:Wii games Category:Xbox 360 games
